name: Payment Flow
description: Payment processing with external payment gateway
diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Customer
    participant Cart
    participant PaymentAPI
    participant PaymentGateway
    participant OrderService

    Customer->>Cart: Checkout
    Cart->>PaymentAPI: Process Payment
    PaymentAPI->>PaymentGateway: Charge Card
    PaymentGateway-->>PaymentAPI: Payment Confirmed
    PaymentAPI->>OrderService: Create Order
    OrderService-->>PaymentAPI: Order Created
    PaymentAPI-->>Cart: Success
    Cart-->>Customer: Order Confirmation
